_source.short_desc: Bridge's LMS helps you create a learning culture that engages & develops employees, and is easy to use with robust learning features.
_source.long_desc: Bridge LMS brings combines an easy to use interface with powerful learning features so you can deliver a people-first learning experience to your employees, partners, and customers.  Bridge is perfect for high-growth, culture driven companies that seek to provide connection, alignment, and growth opportunities for their employees. Help your people achieve their full potential with Bridge.
_source.pricing_details:
Starting at $4 per user, per month. Billed annually.
Please visit https://www.getbridge.com/lms-pricing for additional information on pricing and plans.
_source.target_audience: Perfect for people-first organizations that put building a culture of connection, alignement, and growth and the forefront of their development and talent retention strategy.

media.caption: Bridge's Employee Home Page: See courses, programs, 1:1s, Goals, learning tasks, all in one place.
Bridge's Journeys: Journeys helps you build the courses you want and deliver an engaging training experience?every time
Bridge's Learning Page: Incredibly intuitive interface makes it easy to find, engage with, and complete assigned and optional learning
Bridge's Career Vision Page: Identify career vision, core drivers, and needed skills and then map a plan with courses and activities
Bridge's Analysis Overview: From custom reports, scheduled data delivery, to simply downloading the dashboard as a PDF, understanding your data is quick, easy and intuitive

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most User Friendly LMS Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Canvas is the LMS for everybody, connecting all stakeholders in one location.
related_products.features: Open, intuitive, and born in the cloud, Canvas LMS has become the most widely used learning management system by colleges and universities in North America, and the fastest growing worldwide. Delivering dynamic, engaging learning experiences, its 99.99% uptime ensures instant connection between students and educators, anywhere, anytime.  Visit us at www.instructure.com

related_products.short_desc: Free online learning management system, providing educators around the world with an open source solution for e-learning.
related_products.features: Improve your teaching and learner outcomes with Moodle LMS, the customisable open source learning management system used by over 300 million people in over 100 languages worldwide. Our feature-rich platform is secure and scalable, integrates seamlessly with third-party platforms and plugins, and allows teachers to create engaging, accessible and active learning experiences.

related_products.short_desc: Easily and consistently educate your employees as you engage them with on-demand training.
related_products.features: Paycom provides user-friendly HR and payroll technology to enhance the entire employee life cycle, all in a single software. From onboarding and benefits enrollment to talent management and more, Paycom streamlines processes, drives efficiencies, increases data integrity and gives employees power over their own HR information through a self-service app. Easily educate your employees as you engage them with on-demand training by creating your own courses or using our built-in library of courses.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based HCM platform bringing together payroll, time + attendance, and HR for organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.
related_products.features: Dayforce is a global HCM platform that transforms the employee experience. It unifies data from across the entire employee lifecycle to enable better decision-making at every level. Dayforce is a comprehensive cloud platform that combines HR, payroll, workforce management and talent management in a single application. Our scalable platform is built with a single, flexible rules engine combined with real-time updates and calculations that help address complex regulatory requirements.

related_products.short_desc: Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LXP that delivers a personalized learning experience at scale.
related_products.features:
Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LMS. Deliver an enhanced & enjoyable learning experience for your learners. Address skill gaps and drive personalized learning at scale
Experience a world-class enterprise LMS from Adobe that is: 
1. Awarded for excellence across multiple categories
2. Recognized by leading analysts and industry bodies
3. Used by millions of engaged learners
4. Preferred by Fortune 500 enterprises

related_products.short_desc: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Easy to manage and a joy to use, teams embrace training from the very first click.
related_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide the right training to any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Schoology, a PowerSchool company, is the education technology company putting collaboration at the heart of the learning experience.
related_products.features: Schoology seamlessly connects learning management with assessments so that school districts can improve student performance, foster collaboration throughout their community, and personalize learning for every student. Every day millions of students, parents, faculty and administrators from nearly 2,000 K-12 school districts leverage Schoology to advance what is possible in education.

related_products.short_desc: Through our innovative technology and services, Blackboard helps organizations turn learning into a strategic advantage.
related_products.features: Blackboard is the largest learning company in the world. With over 100 million learners and 20 years of experience, we've perfected the art of effective learning. We've helped over 700 corporate and government organizations around the world deliver outcomes-based learning that drives employee growth in a measurable way. Our unified learning ecosystem of both technology and services provides a trusted one-stop solution that powers learning programs that make employees and organizations thrive.

related_products.short_desc: The easy-to-use, modern LMS for modern teams. Onboard, train, track, and test on every need-to-know for every role and responsibility.
related_products.features: Trainual is built for fast-growing businesses eager to document every process, policy, role, and responsibility in one simple, searchable system, with training modules and tests for built-in accountability. The easiest way to build your online training manuals and ensure consistent training every time. Quickly becoming one the top LMS products on the market. Simple flat rate plans for all size teams.

related_products.short_desc: Compliance & CE is a complete learning management solution for your laboratory.
related_products.features: Compliance & CE is a complete learning solution for your laboratory. Provide safety training, P.A.C.E.-approved continuing education, and custom courses and checklists to your employees in one cost-effective online system.

related_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike, and a built-in content library.
related_products.features: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike. It's known for quick deployment and simple integration with other key business systems, as well as automation of formerly time-consuming tasks, such as user onboarding and reporting. It offers custom UI branding and dashboards, built-in content authoring, and access to a large library of off-the-shelf content. Other popular features include video assessments, gamification, and mobile responsiveness.

similar_products.short_desc: 360Learning is the LMS for collaborative learning. We help companies upskill from within by turning internal SMEs into growth drivers.
similar_products.features: Your employees have valuable knowledge, and you need to tap into it. Now, you can. 360Learning enables companies to upskill from within by turning their experts into champions for employee, customer, and partner growth. With our LMS for collaborative learning, L&D teams can accelerate upskilling with the help of internal experts instead of top-down training. 360Learning is the easiest way to onboard and upskill employees, train customer-facing teams, and enable customers-all from one place.

similar_products.short_desc: LMS designed to help healthcare organizations create, manage, and track learning, training, and compliance for the entire workforce.
similar_products.features: A modern, customizable healthcare workforce learning platform, that allows your organization to strategically manage and continuously develop your staff towards better patient care. Designed to help organizations create, organize, and manage training for their workforce, the HealthStream Learning Center enables educators to create learning courses using customizable templates, gamification features, microlearning aspects and authoring tools to enhance engagement. Address compliance needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Udemy Business helps companies stay competitive in today's rapidly changing workplace by offering fresh, on-demand learning content.
similar_products.features: Udemy Business helps companies achieve critical business outcomes and stay competitive by offering engaging on-demand, immersive, and cohort-based learning. With our integrated learning solutions and strategic partnership, we equip companies with the tools to build a future-ready workforce, increase employee engagement, and achieve business outcomes.

similar_products.short_desc: Learn how leading mid size companies easily train their remote teams from anywhere in the world with Trakstar Learn.
similar_products.features: Easily train your remote team with Trakstar's learning management software. Train from anywhere in the world with a learning management system for the modern workforce. Manage training across hundreds or thousands of employees in your organization. Learn how leading mid size companies use Trakstar Learn to quickly create quizzes and assessments, make training more impactful and never miss another compliance training deadline. See a free demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one system of learning that brings together learning, growth, skills, and capabilities into a personalized, curated experience.
similar_products.features: Cornerstone Learning helps you provide a connected learning and growth experience for your people. Create a personalized development and growth experience that inspires people and accelerates transformation. Get a solution designed to dynamically understand your users, connect them to personalized opportunities for growth and help them develop the skills that will get them here to there.

similar_products.short_desc: Over 1,300 L&D teams around the world partner with LearnUpon LMS to execute their learning strategy and hit their learning goals.
similar_products.features:
At LearnUpon LMS we're on a mission to help you unlock the power of learning. Combining our award winning LMS and our industry-leading Customer Experience team, we pride ourselves on being a trusted partner to over 1,300 businesses.

Every day, L&D teams around the world choose LearnUpon's intuitive, feature-rich and deeply integrate-able platform to deliver a connected learning experience to millions of learners across their employees, customers and partners. Plans start at $15,000 USD.

similar_products.short_desc: EdCast by Cornerstone is an AI-Powered LXP and Knowledge Cloud for Unified Discovery, Knowledge Management and Personalized Learning.
similar_products.features: EdCast by Cornerstone is an AI-Powered Learning Experience Platform (LXP) and Knowledge Cloud for Unified Discovery, Knowledge Management and Personalized Learning. Its award-winning platform is used internationally by Global 2000 companies and large government organizations, including NASSCOM and World Economic Forum, to solve the discovery and curation problems across all external and internal knowledge sources.

similar_products.short_desc: Engaging 23.5 million learners, Absorb LMS has the intuitive interface, agile features and 24/7 support to empower your organization.
similar_products.features: Absorb LMS empowers businesses across the globe to surpass learning goals. Built to deliver flexible training, the intuitive design and robust features create an engaging learning environment that keeps your employees, customers and partners coming back for more. Serving customers in 120 industry verticals, Absorb LMS offers automation and deep reporting capabilities to save time and prove ROI. Tap the scalable LMS that supports integration and security, while offering 24/7 in-house support.

similar_products.short_desc: Tovuti is an all-in-one eLearning platform that empowers companies of all kinds to activate the potential of their organization.
similar_products.features: Tovuti's all-in-one cloud-based learning management system (LMS) gives you all the tools you need to create, deliver, and track the effectiveness of your eLearning programs. Create engaging interactive courses in minutes using Tovuti's interactive modules and our easy to use course creation suite. Build as many courses and lessons as you need. Give learners a personal dashboard with everything relevant to their learning experiences such as courses, checklists, badges, certificates, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: Support the entire student journey from mastering academic concepts to extracurriculars with Blackbaud's forward-thinking LMS.
similar_products.features: Blackbaud Learning Management System delivers the necessary functionality from assignments and graded discussions to rubrics and competency-based education, to power academic programs in the classroom and online. Our robust partner ecosystem, LTI and OneRecord compliance further boost distance learning capabilities. Give educators the tools to create engaging course pages; coaches the ability to add announcements, post training videos and students can manage coursework from mobile devices.

similar_products.short_desc: The scalable learning management software that integrates with your current systems, streamlines training, and automates compliance.
similar_products.features:
The LMS software made to meet critical training, certification, and compliance needs in highly-skilled industries. Seertech's award-winning learning platform integrates with your current systems, streamlines training & certification, improves your operations, and manages your workforce all in one.

Suitable for enterprise businesses in mission-critical industries, your people will get access to virtualized learning, AI-based recommendations, continuing education, high stakes certification & more

similar_products.short_desc: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Easy to manage and a joy to use, teams embrace training from the very first click.
similar_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide the right training to any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike, and a built-in content library.
similar_products.features: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike. It's known for quick deployment and simple integration with other key business systems, as well as automation of formerly time-consuming tasks, such as user onboarding and reporting. It offers custom UI branding and dashboards, built-in content authoring, and access to a large library of off-the-shelf content. Other popular features include video assessments, gamification, and mobile responsiveness.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Course Authoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Course Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Course authoring software enables organizations to develop customized training courses for educating employees, or for teachers to develop courses for their students. Course content can often be imported from multiple applications, and presented in different media formats. Once developed, courses can be published through a Learning Management System (LMS) or Training software, or as stand alone computer / web based training.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top eLearning Authoring tools on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of eLearning Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: eLearning Authoring Tools are used to create engaging, interactive educational content delivered through digital media and electronic devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Experience Platform software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Experience Platform tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Experience Platforms (LEP) allow organizations to consolidate diverse training resources into a single place and provide personalized learning paths and experiences for each trainee.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Learning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Learning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Learning software facilitates access to learning platforms on portable devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Administration software automates the administrative functions of schools including student information, admissions and records for school administrators, office managers, accountants and registrars. School Administration applications manage all school information via a single interface, including: student, family and staff data, courses and classes and faculty data. They provide integration for admissions, enrollment and class scheduling and also perform billing and tuition management functions. School Administration software is related to Classroom Management software, Gradebook software and School Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Training software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Training tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Training software, also known as eLearning or Computer-Based Training (CBT) software, automates educational activities for students and/or corporate employees. Training solutions are often customizable based on the needs of specific organizations and include capabilities such as course registration and testing, certification tracking, conferencing, skills tracking, and reporting. Training applications may provide the framework for presenting classes, as well as an ecommerce functions, to allow for payments. Training software is related to Courseware and Learning Management Systems (LMS).

_source.short_desc: Bridge employee development platform increases engagement through learning, collaboration, skill building, & career development.
_source.long_desc: Bridge is an integrated talent management platform that combines learning management, performance management, career development, and engagement measurement into one platform. Bridge enables companies to develop their people with live, virtual, on-demand and experience based training, manager/employees 1:1s, and career development plans. Used by more than 1000 companies worldwide, Bridge helps companies achieve their strategic people development goals by facilitating connection, alignment, and g

category_features.definition: Games or game-like elements to track progress and reward accomplishments

category_features.name: Learner Portal
category_features.definition: Students can access materials and communicate with instructors via their online student profile

category_features.name: Mobile Learning
category_features.definition: Access for students to complete learning materials on mobile platforms

category_features.name: SCORM Compliance
category_features.definition: SCORM Compliance

category_features.name: Synchronous Learning
category_features.definition: Learning sessions in which a group of learners are participating and engaging in learning at the same time

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Adds audio/visual capabilities for remote learners and instructors

category_features.name: eCommerce Management
category_features.definition: Sell products online

category_features.name: eLearning Companies
category_features.definition: Software specialized for companies that sell courses/content

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting

category_features.name: Customization
category_features.definition: Customize the levels of performance/achievement (i.e. numeric or alphabetic)

category_features.name: Individual Development Plans
category_features.definition: Document completed by employee to assist with career and personal development to reach short term and long term goals

category_features.name: On-going Performance Tracking
category_features.definition: Organize real time feedback and assessments on employees' skills and accomplishments to determine promotions or performance plans

category_features.name: Peer Appraisals
category_features.definition: Peer/teammate feedback and review on individual's performance

category_features.name: Review Cycle Tracking
category_features.definition: Follow the progression of a task associated with performance reviews

category_features.name: Self Assessment
category_features.definition: An individual's evaluation of his or her own strengths, weaknesses, and skills

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Skills Assessment
category_features.definition: Observe employees over a period of time to gain an understanding of their abilities to perform certain tasks

category_features.name: Weighted Performance Measures
category_features.definition: Assess skills, outcomes and results using preset metrics and averages

related_products.short_desc: ADP Workforce Now is a human capital management solution for companies with more than 50 employees.
related_products.features:
The core capabilities of the solution are human resources management, payroll, benefits, talent management, compliance, time & labor management, analytics & benchmarking. 
The fully integrated suite is built on a single database, which automates data synchronization across different components and helps users to minimize manual administrative tasks. The platform also integrates with other HR and business applications via the ADP Marketplace and APIs.

related_products.short_desc: Gusto is the all-in-one HR platform for growing businesses-one place to hire, pay, insure, and manage your hardworking team.
related_products.features:
Whether you're just getting started or scaling your fast-growing business, Gusto is the partner you need to grow and nurture your team. With Gusto, you get modern HR features like payroll, benefits, hiring, management resources, and more - all in one place. 

Gusto is proud to serve more than 200,000 businesses across the US with a single trusted system, competitive compensation tools, and expert guidance to help you empower your team. Because when your people thrive, your business thrives too.

related_products.short_desc: A collaborative platform to help HR teams manage the entire employee lifecycle from recruitment to performance reports in one place.
related_products.features: monday.com is a collaborative platform that allows HR managers to manage the entire employee lifecycle in one place. Track the recruitment process of all candidates at a glance, onboard new employees with pre-made templates, plan team-building activities to engage current employees, and leverage data-driven insights with analytics built into your daily workflows. Finally, integrate monday.com with Gmail and 40+ tools you already use so the platform supplements your current workflows seamlessly.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline HR and payroll processes and get fast access to employee data using one intuitive platform.
related_products.features: Paycor empowers leaders to modernize every aspect of people management so they can focus on what really matters: building winning teams. With Paycor's unified HCM solution, employee data is easily accessible in one place, so you'll never have to switch platforms, access multiple systems or re-key information. HR leaders depend on Paycor to automate routine tasks, mitigate compliance risk, drive efficiencies and gain a deeper understanding of business needs with robust analytics and insights.

related_products.short_desc: BambooHR is an award-winning HR platform that helps your growing organizations automate, centralize, and connect your people data.
related_products.features: BambooHR is an award-winning, all-in-one HR platform made for small and medium businesses and the people who work in them-like you. BambooHR makes it easy to collect, analyze, and report on your people data, improve the way you find and hire talent, onboard new employees, manage compensation, and develop your company culture. It's designed to set you free to focus on what matters most-growing your people, improving the employee experience, and taking your organization forward.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 rated All-in-One HR Software. Manage your Payroll, Benefits, Compliance, IT, and more -- all in one, modern system.
related_products.features: Rippling is the #1 Rated All-In-One HR Platform. You can onboard new hires in 90 seconds, and easily manage your company's payroll, benefits, HR, and IT -- all in one, modern system. It brings all of your employee systems and data together, and helps automate your busy work. Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can click a button, and take care of a new hires' I-9, offer letter, payroll, health insurance, and more -- 100% online and paperlessly.

related_products.short_desc: Paychex makes paying and managing your employees easy and automatic.  Get 3 months free.
related_products.features: Our modular, end-to-end online human resource management system helps you recruit, hire, pay, and manage your workforce all in one place. Accessible from any desktop or mobile device via single sign-on, you spend less time on admin tasks and more time focusing on what matters most to your company.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: The smarter way for a small business to manage an hourly team. Time clocks, scheduling, payroll, messaging, and HR all in one.
related_products.features:
Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate the stress and complexity of HR administration for you and your employees.
related_products.features: Zenefits is a SaaS cloud-based HR platform that helps small and mid-sized companies empower their workforce, manage change and stay compliant. Zenefits' People Platform delivers the most comprehensive, intuitive HR experience in the market. Its HR, Benefits, Payroll and Performance apps combine with advisory services and integrated partner apps to radically simplify HR administration  reducing paperwork and complexity so companies can focus on starting, running and growing their businesses.

related_products.short_desc: Workforce management, Employee scheduling solution that helps organizations manage shifts, payroll, leaves, overtime calculations etc
related_products.features: UKG Kronos Workforce Ready is a human capital management suite of tools on a single unified cloud platform that helps you manage the entire employee lifecycle from pre-hire to retire. Solutions for HR, recruiting, onboarding, time tracking, payroll, and more are easily accessed through a single intuitive interface. Automated and scalable tools provide a single source of truth with common reporting, dashboards, and robust workflows. Included self-service and mobile app allow easy, anytime access.

similar_products.short_desc: BambooHR is an award-winning HR platform that helps your growing organizations automate, centralize, and connect your people data.
similar_products.features: BambooHR is an award-winning, all-in-one HR platform made for small and medium businesses and the people who work in them-like you. BambooHR makes it easy to collect, analyze, and report on your people data, improve the way you find and hire talent, onboard new employees, manage compensation, and develop your company culture. It's designed to set you free to focus on what matters most-growing your people, improving the employee experience, and taking your organization forward.

With Rippling, you can click a button, and take care of a new hires' I-9, offer letter, payroll, health insurance, and more -- 100% online and paperlessly.

similar_products.short_desc: Paylocity's comprehensive product suite delivers a unified platform for professionals to make strategic HR and payroll decisions!
similar_products.features: Paylocity's comprehensive product suite delivers a unified platform for professionals to make strategic decisions in the areas of benefits, core HR, payroll, talent, and workforce management, while cultivating a modern workplace and improving employee engagement. The platform can be accessed 24*7 from any given location using the mobile application.

similar_products.short_desc: bob's breadth of core HR functionally gives your team everything needed to operate efficiently.
similar_products.features: From out-of-the-box onboarding, workflows, performance, and compensation management to integrations with leading payroll providers, and more-Bob's breadth of core HR functionally gives your team everything needed to operate efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Paychex makes paying and managing your employees easy and automatic.  Get 3 months free.
similar_products.features: Our modular, end-to-end online human resource management system helps you recruit, hire, pay, and manage your workforce all in one place. Accessible from any desktop or mobile device via single sign-on, you spend less time on admin tasks and more time focusing on what matters most to your company.

similar_products.short_desc: Streamline HR and payroll processes and get fast access to employee data using one intuitive platform.
similar_products.features: Paycor empowers leaders to modernize every aspect of people management so they can focus on what really matters: building winning teams. With Paycor's unified HCM solution, employee data is easily accessible in one place, so you'll never have to switch platforms, access multiple systems or re-key information. HR leaders depend on Paycor to automate routine tasks, mitigate compliance risk, drive efficiencies and gain a deeper understanding of business needs with robust analytics and insights.

similar_products.short_desc:
Payroll and compliance built for the worldwide workforce. 

Hire and pay without barriers with built-in compliance and security.
similar_products.features:
Deel is global payroll and compliant hiring built for remote teams. Instantly hire employees or independent contractors across the world legally, in minutes. 

With Deel, HR teams can hire anyone in over 150 countries stress-free, with international payroll, local regulatory compliance, and global benefits, all from central, easy-to-use interface. Manage equipment, stock options, time off, and more.

Deel is trusted by over 4,500 companies working internationally.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: A single cloud-based HR, Payroll, Time, Benefits, and Talent Management solution for complete employee lifecycle management.
similar_products.features:
Designed for mid-market organizations (100+ employees). PeopleGuru develops and supports cloud-based Human Capital Management (HCM) software to help mid-market organizations attract, retain, and recognize their people and streamline back-office HR and Payroll functions. 

PeopleGuru HCM is a cloud-based, agile solution residing on one database that includes: HR, Payroll, ACA, Benefits Management, Time & Labor, Recruiting, Onboarding, Performance, Analytics, Salary, and Social.

similar_products.short_desc: Create more human experiences for all talent and unlock the skills and potential of your global workforce.
similar_products.features: Beamery's Talent Lifecycle Management platform allows enterprises to create more human experiences for all talent, and unlock the skills and potential of their global workforce. We help organizations identify and acquire top talent, move the needle on DE&I, close key skill gaps and retain top performers.

similar_products.short_desc: An all-in-one organizational app that's both powerful, affordable and easy to use, especially for the mobile workforce. Start for free!
similar_products.features: Connecteam is the perfect all-in-one solution for the mobile workforce. It offers the full package so HR professionals can easily manage all their employees from one place. From the moment an employee begins onboarding to direct internal communication to time tracking and compliance, Connecteam has it all. This helps keep your team productive and engaged while you have full visibility of what is going on. Book a demo now!

similar_products.short_desc: Technology to create an environment that inspires growth, productivity, and success for all.
similar_products.features: Cornerstone HR is designed to drive smarter workforce decisions. Manage people data across the globe and extend legacy HR with a single, modern experience. Quickly and cost-effectively centralise employee data, improve workforce reporting, and engage your employees. Extend and connect your HR solutions with a robust set of integrations, APIs,and developer documentation.Save money and resources by-going live in a matter of weeks!

similar_products.short_desc: Prioritize your people with simplified management for all things HR. Paperless Onboarding, Documents, Payroll, Benefits, and more.
similar_products.features: When you start with Sentric, you and your team start making a difference from day one. From onboarding to payroll and everything in between, SentricHR has the tools you need for every step of the employee lifecycle. With easy-to-use software, pre-packaged workflows, and a team of product experts ready to help, its easy to see why SentricHR makes managing people easier.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Applicant Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Applicant Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Applicant Tracking software allows organizations to easily manage the hiring process by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. Applicant Tracking solutions can be used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates' skills against job requirements. Many Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) include an interface that allows recruiters to manage all of an organization's job openings. Applicant Tracking software is related to Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Benefits Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Benefits Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Benefits Administration software helps HR professionals organize employee information for medical, dental, 401K, disability and retirement benefits. This software helps ensure compliance with benefit eligibility and COBRA standards, and tracks benefit spending for companies in nearly any industry. These solutions also include benefit statement software and benefit plan software. Benefits Administration software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Compensation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Compensation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Compensation Management software helps organizations improve employees' motivation and retention by structuring performance-based benefits, streamlining payment adjustments across the company and tracking compensation payouts. Compensation Management software is related to Talent Management software, Performance Appraisal software, Commission software and Payroll software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Onboarding software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Onboarding tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Onboarding software eliminates the need for paper forms and automates workflows associated with getting a new hire up and running with the company.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Payroll software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Payroll tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Payroll software automates the management of employees' salaries, wages, bonuses and deductions. Time off, vacation accrual, benefits and retirement accounts can also be tracked by a Payroll software system. These applications allow businesses to keep the payroll process in-house. Payroll software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Payroll software Human Resource software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Performance Appraisal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Performance Management software automates the process of reviewing employee performance, setting new objectives, and writing individual development plans. A type of Performance Management solution is 360 degree feedback software, which manages the process in which an employee completes a self-evaluation and is also evaluated by their manager, peers, and direct reports. Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reference Check software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reference Check tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reference Check software streamlines and automates the process of requesting and collecting job references. There are two types of Reference Check software. In the first type, candidates provide their referees? contact information to recruiters who then reach out to the referees through Reference Check software. The second type of software is a platform accessible by referees, candidates, recruiters, and HR professionals that allows candidates to reach out to the referees and collect references directly.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Succession Planning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Succession Planning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Succession Planning software helps organizations identify and develop promotable employees for all the key areas in the company. These applications assist with retention of talent and help organizations prepare smooth transitions when a change in leadership is necessary. In order to avoid duplication of effort in data collection, Succession Planning software can integrate with other HR applications, such as talent management or performance appraisal solutions. For related software solutions see Talent Management software, Workforce Management software, Training software and Performance Appraisal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.

_source.features_tokenized_text: 360_degree_feedback compensation_management employee_database employee_profiles onboarding performance_management self_service_portal

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

_source.short_desc: Bridge's LMS helps you create a learning culture that engages & develops employees, and is easy to use with robust learning features.
_source.long_desc: Bridge LMS brings combines an easy to use interface with powerful learning features so you can deliver a people-first learning experience to your employees, partners, and customers.  Bridge is perfect for high-growth, culture driven companies that seek to provide connection, alignment, and growth opportunities for their employees. Help your people achieve their full potential with Bridge.
_source.pricing_details:
Starting at $4 per user, per month. Billed annually.
Please visit https://www.getbridge.com/lms-pricing for additional information on pricing and plans.
_source.target_audience: Perfect for people-first organizations that put building a culture of connection, alignement, and growth and the forefront of their development and talent retention strategy.

media.caption: Bridge's Employee Home Page: See courses, programs, 1:1s, Goals, learning tasks, all in one place.
Bridge's Journeys: Journeys helps you build the courses you want and deliver an engaging training experience?every time
Bridge's Learning Page: Incredibly intuitive interface makes it easy to find, engage with, and complete assigned and optional learning
Bridge's Career Vision Page: Identify career vision, core drivers, and needed skills and then map a plan with courses and activities
Bridge's Analysis Overview: From custom reports, scheduled data delivery, to simply downloading the dashboard as a PDF, understanding your data is quick, easy and intuitive

related_products.short_desc: Canvas is the LMS for everybody, connecting all stakeholders in one location.
related_products.features: Open, intuitive, and born in the cloud, Canvas LMS has become the most widely used learning management system by colleges and universities in North America, and the fastest growing worldwide. Delivering dynamic, engaging learning experiences, its 99.99% uptime ensures instant connection between students and educators, anywhere, anytime.  Visit us at www.instructure.com

related_products.short_desc: Free online learning management system, providing educators around the world with an open source solution for e-learning.
related_products.features: Improve your teaching and learner outcomes with Moodle LMS, the customisable open source learning management system used by over 300 million people in over 100 languages worldwide. Our feature-rich platform is secure and scalable, integrates seamlessly with third-party platforms and plugins, and allows teachers to create engaging, accessible and active learning experiences.

related_products.short_desc: Easily and consistently educate your employees as you engage them with on-demand training.
related_products.features: Paycom provides user-friendly HR and payroll technology to enhance the entire employee life cycle, all in a single software. From onboarding and benefits enrollment to talent management and more, Paycom streamlines processes, drives efficiencies, increases data integrity and gives employees power over their own HR information through a self-service app. Easily educate your employees as you engage them with on-demand training by creating your own courses or using our built-in library of courses.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based HCM platform bringing together payroll, time + attendance, and HR for organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.
related_products.features: Dayforce is a global HCM platform that transforms the employee experience. It unifies data from across the entire employee lifecycle to enable better decision-making at every level. Dayforce is a comprehensive cloud platform that combines HR, payroll, workforce management and talent management in a single application. Our scalable platform is built with a single, flexible rules engine combined with real-time updates and calculations that help address complex regulatory requirements.

related_products.short_desc: Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LXP that delivers a personalized learning experience at scale.
related_products.features:
Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LMS. Deliver an enhanced & enjoyable learning experience for your learners. Address skill gaps and drive personalized learning at scale
Experience a world-class enterprise LMS from Adobe that is: 
1. Awarded for excellence across multiple categories
2. Recognized by leading analysts and industry bodies
3. Used by millions of engaged learners
4. Preferred by Fortune 500 enterprises

related_products.short_desc: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Easy to manage and a joy to use, teams embrace training from the very first click.
related_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide the right training to any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Schoology, a PowerSchool company, is the education technology company putting collaboration at the heart of the learning experience.
related_products.features: Schoology seamlessly connects learning management with assessments so that school districts can improve student performance, foster collaboration throughout their community, and personalize learning for every student. Every day millions of students, parents, faculty and administrators from nearly 2,000 K-12 school districts leverage Schoology to advance what is possible in education.

related_products.short_desc: Through our innovative technology and services, Blackboard helps organizations turn learning into a strategic advantage.
related_products.features: Blackboard is the largest learning company in the world. With over 100 million learners and 20 years of experience, we've perfected the art of effective learning. We've helped over 700 corporate and government organizations around the world deliver outcomes-based learning that drives employee growth in a measurable way. Our unified learning ecosystem of both technology and services provides a trusted one-stop solution that powers learning programs that make employees and organizations thrive.

related_products.short_desc: The easy-to-use, modern LMS for modern teams. Onboard, train, track, and test on every need-to-know for every role and responsibility.
related_products.features: Trainual is built for fast-growing businesses eager to document every process, policy, role, and responsibility in one simple, searchable system, with training modules and tests for built-in accountability. The easiest way to build your online training manuals and ensure consistent training every time. Quickly becoming one the top LMS products on the market. Simple flat rate plans for all size teams.

related_products.short_desc: Compliance & CE is a complete learning management solution for your laboratory.
related_products.features: Compliance & CE is a complete learning solution for your laboratory. Provide safety training, P.A.C.E.-approved continuing education, and custom courses and checklists to your employees in one cost-effective online system.

related_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike, and a built-in content library.
related_products.features: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike. It's known for quick deployment and simple integration with other key business systems, as well as automation of formerly time-consuming tasks, such as user onboarding and reporting. It offers custom UI branding and dashboards, built-in content authoring, and access to a large library of off-the-shelf content. Other popular features include video assessments, gamification, and mobile responsiveness.

similar_products.short_desc: 360Learning is the LMS for collaborative learning. We help companies upskill from within by turning internal SMEs into growth drivers.
similar_products.features: Your employees have valuable knowledge, and you need to tap into it. Now, you can. 360Learning enables companies to upskill from within by turning their experts into champions for employee, customer, and partner growth. With our LMS for collaborative learning, L&D teams can accelerate upskilling with the help of internal experts instead of top-down training. 360Learning is the easiest way to onboard and upskill employees, train customer-facing teams, and enable customers-all from one place.

similar_products.short_desc: LMS designed to help healthcare organizations create, manage, and track learning, training, and compliance for the entire workforce.
similar_products.features: A modern, customizable healthcare workforce learning platform, that allows your organization to strategically manage and continuously develop your staff towards better patient care. Designed to help organizations create, organize, and manage training for their workforce, the HealthStream Learning Center enables educators to create learning courses using customizable templates, gamification features, microlearning aspects and authoring tools to enhance engagement. Address compliance needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Udemy Business helps companies stay competitive in today's rapidly changing workplace by offering fresh, on-demand learning content.
similar_products.features: Udemy Business helps companies achieve critical business outcomes and stay competitive by offering engaging on-demand, immersive, and cohort-based learning. With our integrated learning solutions and strategic partnership, we equip companies with the tools to build a future-ready workforce, increase employee engagement, and achieve business outcomes.

similar_products.short_desc: Learn how leading mid size companies easily train their remote teams from anywhere in the world with Trakstar Learn.
similar_products.features: Easily train your remote team with Trakstar's learning management software. Train from anywhere in the world with a learning management system for the modern workforce. Manage training across hundreds or thousands of employees in your organization. Learn how leading mid size companies use Trakstar Learn to quickly create quizzes and assessments, make training more impactful and never miss another compliance training deadline. See a free demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one system of learning that brings together learning, growth, skills, and capabilities into a personalized, curated experience.
similar_products.features: Cornerstone Learning helps you provide a connected learning and growth experience for your people. Create a personalized development and growth experience that inspires people and accelerates transformation. Get a solution designed to dynamically understand your users, connect them to personalized opportunities for growth and help them develop the skills that will get them here to there.

similar_products.short_desc: Over 1,300 L&D teams around the world partner with LearnUpon LMS to execute their learning strategy and hit their learning goals.
similar_products.features:
At LearnUpon LMS we're on a mission to help you unlock the power of learning. Combining our award winning LMS and our industry-leading Customer Experience team, we pride ourselves on being a trusted partner to over 1,300 businesses.

Every day, L&D teams around the world choose LearnUpon's intuitive, feature-rich and deeply integrate-able platform to deliver a connected learning experience to millions of learners across their employees, customers and partners. Plans start at $15,000 USD.

similar_products.short_desc: EdCast by Cornerstone is an AI-Powered LXP and Knowledge Cloud for Unified Discovery, Knowledge Management and Personalized Learning.
similar_products.features: EdCast by Cornerstone is an AI-Powered Learning Experience Platform (LXP) and Knowledge Cloud for Unified Discovery, Knowledge Management and Personalized Learning. Its award-winning platform is used internationally by Global 2000 companies and large government organizations, including NASSCOM and World Economic Forum, to solve the discovery and curation problems across all external and internal knowledge sources.

similar_products.short_desc: Engaging 23.5 million learners, Absorb LMS has the intuitive interface, agile features and 24/7 support to empower your organization.
similar_products.features: Absorb LMS empowers businesses across the globe to surpass learning goals. Built to deliver flexible training, the intuitive design and robust features create an engaging learning environment that keeps your employees, customers and partners coming back for more. Serving customers in 120 industry verticals, Absorb LMS offers automation and deep reporting capabilities to save time and prove ROI. Tap the scalable LMS that supports integration and security, while offering 24/7 in-house support.

similar_products.short_desc: Tovuti is an all-in-one eLearning platform that empowers companies of all kinds to activate the potential of their organization.
similar_products.features: Tovuti's all-in-one cloud-based learning management system (LMS) gives you all the tools you need to create, deliver, and track the effectiveness of your eLearning programs. Create engaging interactive courses in minutes using Tovuti's interactive modules and our easy to use course creation suite. Build as many courses and lessons as you need. Give learners a personal dashboard with everything relevant to their learning experiences such as courses, checklists, badges, certificates, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: Support the entire student journey from mastering academic concepts to extracurriculars with Blackbaud's forward-thinking LMS.
similar_products.features: Blackbaud Learning Management System delivers the necessary functionality from assignments and graded discussions to rubrics and competency-based education, to power academic programs in the classroom and online. Our robust partner ecosystem, LTI and OneRecord compliance further boost distance learning capabilities. Give educators the tools to create engaging course pages; coaches the ability to add announcements, post training videos and students can manage coursework from mobile devices.

similar_products.short_desc: The scalable learning management software that integrates with your current systems, streamlines training, and automates compliance.
similar_products.features:
The LMS software made to meet critical training, certification, and compliance needs in highly-skilled industries. Seertech's award-winning learning platform integrates with your current systems, streamlines training & certification, improves your operations, and manages your workforce all in one.

Suitable for enterprise businesses in mission-critical industries, your people will get access to virtualized learning, AI-based recommendations, continuing education, high stakes certification & more

similar_products.short_desc: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Easy to manage and a joy to use, teams embrace training from the very first click.
similar_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide the right training to any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

similar_products.features: SAP Litmos Training delivers powerful but easy-to-use LMS features for admins and learners alike. It's known for quick deployment and simple integration with other key business systems, as well as automation of formerly time-consuming tasks, such as user onboarding and reporting. It offers custom UI branding and dashboards, built-in content authoring, and access to a large library of off-the-shelf content. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Course Authoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Course Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Course authoring software enables organizations to develop customized training courses for educating employees, or for teachers to develop courses for their students. Course content can often be imported from multiple applications, and presented in different media formats. Once developed, courses can be published through a Learning Management System (LMS) or Training software, or as stand alone computer / web based training.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top eLearning Authoring tools on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of eLearning Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: eLearning Authoring Tools are used to create engaging, interactive educational content delivered through digital media and electronic devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Experience Platform software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Experience Platform tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Experience Platforms (LEP) allow organizations to consolidate diverse training resources into a single place and provide personalized learning paths and experiences for each trainee.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Learning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Learning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Learning software facilitates access to learning platforms on portable devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Administration software automates the administrative functions of schools including student information, admissions and records for school administrators, office managers, accountants and registrars. School Administration applications manage all school information via a single interface, including: student, family and staff data, courses and classes and faculty data. They provide integration for admissions, enrollment and class scheduling and also perform billing and tuition management functions. School Administration software is related to Classroom Management software, Gradebook software and School Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Training software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Training tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Training software, also known as eLearning or Computer-Based Training (CBT) software, automates educational activities for students and/or corporate employees. Training solutions are often customizable based on the needs of specific organizations and include capabilities such as course registration and testing, certification tracking, conferencing, skills tracking, and reporting. Training applications may provide the framework for presenting classes, as well as an ecommerce functions, to allow for payments. Training software is related to Courseware and Learning Management Systems (LMS).
